node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Bram | Tech Blogger on September 02, 2021. May be an image of laptop and screen.

node.text:
The pegboard is finally on the wall!🔥
.
I don’t really know what I should put on it though😅 I’m thinking about some greenery and maybe a little cup or something to store things.🤔
.
I’m also thinking about hanging a nice print on there😱 We’ll see what’ll happen😂 Got any ideas for the pegboard? Please drop em in the comments!🙌
.
.
.
Join the community: @appletodaynow 🤙
.

node.text:
How to change the Apple Watch control center?😱
.
Simply go to the control center -> scroll all the way down -> hit “change” -> and start adding or moving buttons!🔥
.
I always like to keep my most used buttons like the flashlight and the do not disturb button at the top so I have quick access to them.👌
.
Do you guys change up your Apple Watch control center?⌚️ Let me know in the comments!👏
.
.
.
Follow: @appletodaynow 🚀
.
#applewatchseries6 #applewatch6 #watchos7 #watchos6 #applewatchseries #applewatchse #applewatchfans #applewatchlife #applewatchlifestyle #applelife #applelifestyle #applewatchseries5 #applewatch5 #applewatch44mm #applewatch40mm #appletips #techtips #applestyle #appletech #applewatchface #applewatchfaces #applewatchsport #applewatchnike #applewatchnikeplus #applewatch40mm

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Bram | Tech Blogger on August 31, 2021. May be an image of phone, screen and text that says 'Simpel 15:30 20 0 augustus Zaterdag 21 Geen'.

node.text:
The iPhone 13 is coming with a really exciting feature… and that’s LEO support!😱 But what is LEO?
.
LEO on the iPhone basically means that even when your phone is out of cellular range you’re still able to sent messages and receive phone calls.🙌
.
That’s because LEO (Low-earth-orbit) will connect the iPhone to a satellite which will make this possible🛰 This is really huge because it basically means that you can’t go out of range anymore.🤩
.
Are you hyped for this new feature? Let me know in the comments!🤙
.
.
.
Follow: @appletodaynow 👊
.
#iphone13 #iphone13pro #iphone2021 #apple2021 #applephone #appleiphone12 #appleiphone12pro #lowearthorbit #applerumors #applenews #ipadpro11 #ipadpro2020 #ipadpro2018 #appleipadpro #ipadair4 #ipadair #appleipad #appletech #techie #appleaddict #appleaddicted #appletechnology #technologyisawesome #beautyoftechnology #newtechnology

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Bram | Tech Blogger on August 30, 2021. May be an image of indoor.

node.text:
Let’s do an update on my FCPX learning process!🔥
.
I feel like I’m getting to know the app better and better with each video that I make👌 And I think I’ve nailed down the basics, color grading and some speed ramping stuff!🤙 
.
I am also dabbling in making nice transitions which I think has been going really well👊 I got to thank @daniel.schiffer ‘s tutorials for that one though.🤣
.
I still got a lot to learn though😂 I’ve been struggling with finding the right titles and motion effects for example🤷‍♂️ I also don’t have a clue how LUTs work😅 If anyone wants to help, my DM’s are always open!😝
.
Have a great start of the week!✌️
.
.
.
Follow: @appletodaynow 🎬
.

node.text:
Project HomeKit: Part 2!😱
.
The @netatmo smoke detector is a great addition to my house!🤩 It isn’t a product that I use everyday (at least I hope so), but when I do use it this device could save me a lot of damage to my house!👌
.
It’s better than a regular smoke detector, because it will sent a notification to your phone as well as ring an alarm📣 So you’re notified no matter where you are, so you can act upon the situation sooner no matter where you are.👊
.
The link to the Netatmo smoke detector is in my bio, so go check it out!👏
.
.
.
Follow: @appletodaynow 🦾
.
#smarthome #smarthomes #smarthometechnology #smarthometech #smarthomeautomation #smarthomedesign #smarthomedesign #smarthomesecurity #smarthomesolutions #smarthouse #homekit #applehomekit #techie #techies #techielife #techlife #techlifestyle #applegeek #appletech #homeapp #techgeek #smarttechnology #smarttech #applelifestyle #applehub

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Bram | Tech Blogger on August 27, 2021. May be an image of phone and screen.

node.text:
The AirPods 3 might be dropping this fall, so what are some features you’d like to see in these new earbuds?😱
.
I’d definitely like them to get a bit more waterproof💧Because right now whenever I go running and there’s a possibility that it might rain I simply won’t bring my AirPods because I’ll get anxious about water getting into my earbuds.😬
.
To make the AirPods waterproof they probably have to change the design of the AirPods and I’ve seen some pretty great renders of an AirPods Pro like design.👌
.
It would also be nice if they improve the sound quality and the battery life, but to be honest those are pretty great already so those would just be nice bonuses for me.😂
.
What would you guys like to see in the AirPods 3? Let me know in the comments!👇
.
Have a great Friday y’all!
.
.
.
Follow: @appletodaynow 🚀
.
#airpods3 #airpods2 #airpods🎧 #airpodsapple #appleairpods #airpodsstyle #applestyle #applegeek #applefamily #applecollection #appleproduct #appledevice #cleanminimalism #techminimal #techies #appleipadpro #ipadpro11 #ipadpro129 #ipadpro2021 #iphone12 #appleiphone12 #applepro #iphonewallpaper #wallpaperdesign #mobilewallpaper

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Bram | Tech Blogger on August 26, 2021. May be an image of laptop, screen and text that says '15:03 augustus ustus Zaterdag'.

node.text:
I’m really excited for iPadOS 15!🤩
.
I really think this update will make the iPad an even better main computer🔥 The multitasking is getting a lot better and the new widgets layout will be great as well👌
.
Another feature I’m really looking forward to is the quick notes feature📝 I feel like this is something that had been missing from the iPad and now it’s finally here!🙌
.
What are you most looking forward to with iPadOS 15? Let me know in the comments!👇
.
.
.
Follow: @appletodaynow 🤗
.

node.text:
Do you use Notion?😏
.
I’ve been testing it out for a few weeks now and it has been AMAZING!🤩 If you don’t know what Notion is, it’s basically a really big note taking app.📝
.
And it’s big y’all!🔥 you can add anything from calendars to to-do lists and you can also add tags to keep everything organized!🙌
.
When I first downloaded it the app was a bit overwhelming because of all of those features though😂 But after some YouTube vids and some practice I got the hang of it.👌
.
Do you guys use notion? Or do you have any handy tips for me? Let’s chat in the comments!😊
.
Have a great day y’all!☄️
.
.
.
Join us: @appletodaynow 📸
.
#notion #notionapp #notetaking #ipadapp #appleapp #mobileapp #appdesign #productivityapp #ipadpro #ipadpro11 #appleipadpro #wfhsetup #productivityplanner #applelife #applefamily #appledevice #appleproduct #appleaddict #techstyle #applestyle #ipadair4 #ipadair #appleipad #applesetup #appledaily

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Bram | Tech Blogger on August 23, 2021. May be an image of phone and saddle-stitched leather.

node.text:
Is apple doing multiple events in September?😱
.
A few days ago digitimes came out with an article saying that apple is doing at least 2 events in September🤩 I honestly don’t think this will be the case though.😅
.
That’s because having 2 events so close to each other wouldn’t give each product the press attention it would usually get🤷‍♂️ aka it would hurt the sales.
.
Also, the report comes from digitimes who is not a that trustworthy of a source, so I usually take all their reports with a grain of salt.😬
.
I’m really excited for all the apple events this fall though! Are you? Let’s chat in the comments!🙌
.
PS: yesterday I dropped the first reel of the “project HomeKit” reel series so go check that out!🔥
.
.
.
Follow: @appletodaynow ✌️
.

node.text:
Project HomeKit Part 1!🔥
.
This is the @meet_eve Energy a HomeKit compatible smart plug which you could use to make non-smart-devices smart!🙌
.
I’ve used it to make a regular lamp smart and it has been working really well!👌 The link to the Eve energy is in my bio!😊
.
Follow for more of these smart home reels!💥
.
.
.
#homekit #applehomekit #homeapp #smarthome #smarthometechnology #smarthometech #smarthomedesign #smarthouse #smarthomesystem #smartplug #smartplugs #applelife #futuretech #futuretechnology #appletech #applegeek #technologyrocks #technologyfresh #smartdevices #beautyoftechnology #smarthomeautomation #technologyfresh #eveenergy

node.text:
I recently “discovered” notion and I’m blown away by it!😱
.
I have been looking for a good note taking / documenting app which “does it all” but I wasn’t really able to find one😅 So when I saw what you could do in notion I just had to check it out!🔥
.
In notion you could add anything from to-do lists, to calendars, to worksheets!👌 You can also drag and drop text all across the screen, so you can really customize your “page”.🙌
.
Anyway, I’ll be using notion for all my note taking from now on!✍️ Do you use notion? Let me know in the comments!✌️
.
.
.
Follow: @appletodaynow 📸
.
